BEAUTY BEYOND BOUNDARIES

World Class Beauty.
Canadian Heart.
International Beauty: Where World-Class Innovation Meets Dedicated Canadian Partnership

OUR CANADIAN HEART

100% COMMITTED TO CANADA

Proudly Canadian Since 1981

While our name is International Beauty, our roots run deep in Canadian soil. For over four decades, we've remained proudly 100% Canadian-owned and operatedâ€”a commitment that shapes everything we do.

When you partner with us, you're not supporting a multinational corporation with distant headquarters; you're supporting a Canadian business built on Canadian values.

100% CANADIAN OWNED & OPERATED

ELEVATING CANADIAN BEAUTY

SINCE 1981 â€” PROUDLY CANADIAN OWNED

Supporting Canadian Families

Behind every product we deliver and every training session stands our dedicated Canadian team. We proudly employ a substantial workforce across Western Canada - including sales representatives, customer service specialists, retail store associates, warehouse staff, administrative personnel, and management.

These team members are parents, volunteers, community members, and passionate beauty experts living and working alongside you. Many have been with us for years, even decades, building deep relationships with the salons we serve and contributing their wealth of experience to your success.

Your partnership with IBSS directly supports these Canadian families, fostering meaningful livelihoods across Western Canada and contributing to the economic health of our shared communities.

Our Story: A Canadian Legacy

International Beauty began as a small, home-based business started by Doris Tan in 1981. Over forty years later, we've grown into a trusted cornerstone of Western Canada's beauty industry.

We now have a sales force of over 20 dedicated professionals and a store network of 12 locations, reaching from Manitoba to British Columbia. Operated by Graham Kenny and Leigh Tait since 2014, we remain proudly Canadian and independently owned.

Our passion for the beauty industry is stronger than ever. We embrace the future's challenges and opportunities, committed to evolving while honoring our tradition of dedicated service.

Dedicated to Canadian Salon Success

Your Tangible Benefits

We understand the unique rhythm of operating a salon in Canada because we've lived it for 40+ years. This translates into real advantages for you:

Our 40+ years of local expertise means we deeply understand the nuances of operating a salon in Western Canada â€“ the seasons, trends, and client needs. This understanding shapes everything we do:

The IBSS Difference: Canadian Values in Action

  • Real Relationships: We're neighbours building lasting partnerships.
  • Responsive Support: Speak to fellow Canadians who genuinely care and understand.
  • Community Mindset: We succeed together. When Canadian salons thrive, our communities thrive.
  • Long-term Stability: Our Canadian ownership ensures a stable, reliable partnership focused on your long-term growth.

Our Service Approach

  • Tailored Support: We offer personalized service because we understand Western Canadian markets intimately.
  • Investing Locally: Choosing IBSS keeps investment within Canada, supporting fellow Canadian businesses (like yours!) and strengthening our shared economy.

Education First for Canadian Talent: Our education centers across Western Canada offer relevant, accessible training designed specifically for Canadian professionals, helping you master techniques and trends that resonate with local clientele.

A True Partnership Approach: We're more than just a supplier; we're your neighbours and partners. We offer high-touch, personalized service focused on building lasting relationships.

EDUCATION & EXPERT SUPPORT: BRINGING GLOBAL EXCELLENCE HOME

Where Global Innovation Meets Canadian Expertise

At International Beauty, we believe exceptional products deserve exceptional education. As a leader in continuing education for the professional beauty industry, we've built a comprehensive learning ecosystem designed specifically for Canadian professionals. Through our eight Western Canadian educational centers, we transform global innovations into practical success for local salons and stylists.

An Educational Experience Unlike Any Other

Technical Mastery Workshops: Hands-on training in cutting-edge techniques from around the world, adapted for Canadian clients and trends. From advanced hair coloring and cutting to innovative skincare treatments, our technical education helps you deliver world-class results with confidence.
Business & Marketing Excellence: Running a successful salon in Canada requires specific knowledge. Our business seminars address the unique challenges of Canadian salon operationsâ€”from seasonal marketing strategies to local client retention techniques that build sustainable success.
Inspirational Leadership Events: The beauty industry thrives on creativity and passion. Our motivational sessions feature industry visionaries who inspire while providing practical insights into emerging global trends and how they can be applied in the Canadian market.
In-Depth Product Knowledge: Understanding the science and artistry behind professional products is essential. Our educators provide comprehensive training on our global brands, ensuring you can maximize their performance for your Canadian clients.

ALL ABOUT CONNECTIONS: Our Premier Educational Experience

The pinnacle of our educational commitment is our annual ALL ABOUT CONNECTIONS eventâ€”where Global Excellence and Canadian Heart truly come together. This extraordinary gathering embodies our core values of Inspiration, Innovation, and Interaction, bringing together the industry's brightest minds in a distinctly Canadian setting.
World-Class Education: Workshops with international brand masters like Kevin Murphy's Brandi Holdaway, Matrix's Johanna Costantini and Martin Menard, and AZ Craft Luxury Hair's Jeremy Davies-Barbala bring global expertise directly to Canadian professionals.
Diverse Learning Opportunities: From technical skills (clipper cutting, modern bridal styling, creative color techniques) to business acumen (emerging salon trends, marketing strategies) to specialized knowledge (addressing hair loss, sustainable practices), the event offers something for every career stage and specialty.
Canadian Community Building: Beyond education, ALL ABOUT CONNECTIONS creates space for meaningful professional relationships, with networking opportunities that foster a supportive Canadian beauty community.
Wellness & Balance: Recognizing the unique pressures of salon life, we incorporate health and wellness elements to support the whole professionalâ€”body, mind, and business.
This signature event exemplifies our commitment to bringing global excellence home to Canadian beauty professionals in an environment designed specifically for their success.

Learn from the Best in the Industry

We don't just bring you global brandsâ€”we bring you global expertise. Our educational events feature leading industry professionals, including international platform artists, celebrity stylists, and brand creators who share their knowledge and passion directly with Canadian professionals. These relationships, built over our 40+ years in business, allow us to bring world-class education to your doorstep in Western Canada.

Support Beyond the Classroom

  • Personalized Business Consulting: Tailored advice for your unique salon challenges
  • Technical Troubleshooting: Expert assistance when you need it most
  • Product Guidance: Help selecting the right global innovations for your specific clientele
  • Trend Interpretation: Translating international movements into Canadian-relevant applications

Bridging Global and Localâ€”The IBSS Difference

What truly sets our education apart is how we bridge international excellence with Canadian reality. We don't simply import global techniquesâ€”we thoughtfully adapt them for Canadian professionals, clients, and market conditions. Our educators understand both the innovation behind the brands and the practical realities of Canadian salons.

At International Beauty, education isn't an afterthoughtâ€”it's core to everything we do. By combining Global Excellence in product innovation with our Canadian Heart of understanding and support, we empower your success in ways no other distributor can match. Because when you succeed, we all succeed.
